name: workflowy wide
description: That's it! This style make the workflowy page wide so you can better use it on a larger monitor when you want a wider page. Just enable/disable this theme whenever you want.
additional_info:
You can easily edit this theme too, to choose the width you want. Just change where it say "1048px" to whatever number of pixels you want.

Note: When my theme "workflowy narrow" is enabled, it will override "workflowy wide".
